name: nanaMori
description:
nanaMori is an exploration puzzle game about two classmates going into a house that known to be abandoned for a long time ago. While Mori who has the idea to go ghost hunting there at night invited Nana to do it together, Nana seems to have another goal in mind.

Keep in mind that this game is a work of FICTION. Anything that resembles real life events, persons, places, etc. are purely coincidental. If you have a problem with jumpscares then I advise you to not play this game.

Estimated Playtime: 12 minutes ~ 30 minutes per playthrough.

This is my first finished, polished RPG Maker game after years of playing around with the engine and making pixel art. nanaMori was originally a quick project I made back in the early 2020 when 'rona wasn't even a national news. The yearning of making a finished RPG Maker game made me revisiting (more like remaking from scratch) the project on this year's July. I'm aware that the writing isn't really great since I was more on applying my experience working with the RPG Maker engine and making those pixel arts, I tried my best to salvage the story; reworking the storytelling, fixing plot holes, adding a bit lore, etc.

I hope you enjoy the gaemzzz and can find all the 3 endings! :D

Made using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine.
